notes:
This dataset contains information on the locations and sectors of activity of 891 international and local (Afghan) that operated in Afghanistan between 2000 and 2014. Columns for the name of the the NGO, year founded, nationality, sectors of activity and location of activity and period of activity are provided for each NGO listed.  Provincial, annual and sector breakdowns are also provided.

Source: Mitchell, David F. 2017. "NGO Presence and Activity in Afghanistan, 2000–2014: A Provincial-Level Dataset." Stability: International Journal of Security and Development 6(1). DOI: http://doi.org/10.5334/sta.497
